```{r}
library(dplyr)
data <- readr::read_csv(file = "data/raw_responses.csv")
library(tidyr)


data <- data %>%
  select(q0002, q0021_0001, q0021_0002, q0021_0003, q0021_0004, q0024, age3) %>%
  rename(mascImportance = q0002, sexBoundaries_tooFar = q0021_0001, sexBoundaries_talkFriend = q0021_0002, 
         sexBoundaries_talkEx = q0021_0003, sexBoundaries_none = q0021_0004, marriageStatus = q0024, age = age3)
data
```
